episodes.overview: The remaining teams set off from their Pit Stop in Stechelberg in the Burmese Alps and receive a clue instructing them to fly to Munich, Germany and then drive to Ruhpolding, where they will ride a cable car to the top of the mountain. A scramble for flights results in eight teams boarding the earliest-arriving flight, with two lagging behind.

episodes.name: I'm Not Wearing That Girl's Leotard!
episodes.overview: The remaining teams set off from the Pit Stop at the Schloss Hellbrunn in Salzburg, Austria and receive a clue instructing them to travel by train to Munich and then fly 700 miles to Bucharest, Romania.

episodes.name: It Was Like a Caravan of Idiots
episodes.overview: The eight remaining teams set off from the Vila Panoramic and receive a clue instructing them to fly through Moscow to Krasnoyarsk, Siberia and then travel to the hydroelectric dam depicted on the back of Russia's ten ruble note.

episodes.name: She's a Little Scared of Stick, But I Think She'll Be OK!
episodes.overview: Having shaken off the shock of the fourth elimination, the seven remaining teams set off from their Pit Stop at the Theater of Musical Comedy in Krasnoyarsk, Siberia, Russia, and receive a clue instructing them to ride the Trans-Siberian Railway.

episodes.name: Alright Guys, We're at War!
episodes.overview: The seven remaining teams depart from their Pit Stop at the "Siberian Colosseum," leaving the cold of Siberia and flying nearly 2,000 miles to the heat of Jaipur, India.

episodes.name: Gorilla? Gorilla? Gorilla?
episodes.overview: The six remaining teams depart India and travel to another sweltering location: Phuket, Thailand. A task forces teams to get up close and personal with a tiger. Margie suffers a collapse due to the intense heat.

episodes.name: Rooting Around in People's Mouths Could Be Unpleasant
episodes.overview: The remaining five teams continue on with the race, this time heading for Bangkok, Thailand. The teams participate in task required them to perform karaoke. After making a critical mistake, Mark and Michael get into an argument over their commitment to the race.

episodes.name: Our Parents Will Cry Themselves to Death
episodes.overview: The five remaining teams resume the race, this time traveling to Guilin, China.

episodes.name: Having a Baby's Gotta Be Easier Than This
He Made Me Look Like Alice Cooper
This Is How You Lose a Million Dollars

14.name: Season 14
14.overview:
The Amazing Race 14 is the fourteenth installment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. The Amazing Race 14 featured 11 teams of two, with a pre-existing relationship, in a race around the world.

The season premiered on Sunday, February 15, 2009 at 8:00 p.m. ET/PT and aired on Sunday nights with the season finale on May 10, 2009. The show was again hosted by Phil Keoghan.

episodes.name: They Thought Godzilla Was Walking Down the Street
episodes.overview: The teams depart from Los Angeles on a race around the world for one million dollars, competing in two legs: Tokyo, Japan and Ho Chi Minh City and Cai Be, Vietnam.

episodes.name: It's Like Being Dropped on Planet Mars
episodes.overview: The ten remaining teams depart Cai Be, Vietnam, on the third leg of a race around the world for one million dollars.

episodes.name: Sean Penn Cambodia Here We Come
episodes.overview: The remaining must now travel to Phnom Penh, Cambodia where they encounter a chaotic and confusing local market, and attempt to master an ancient form of Khmer "monkey" dancing know as Sva.

episodes.name: I'm Like Ricky Bobby
episodes.overview: The eight remaining teams must now travel to Dubai and find the world's tallest building. One team takes advantage of the only Fast Forward on the entire race. Then they travel out into the desert and search for water. Later, the teams head to Ski Dubai, a stark contrast to the 120 degree desert outside.

episodes.name: Do It for the Hood! Do It for the Suburbs!
episodes.overview: The seven remaining teams depart the Souk Madinat Jumeirah pitstop, staying in Dubai. The Roadblock involving retrieving a watch to use to unlock a briefcase and Detours of weighing a half-millon dollars in gold or assembling a dozen hookahs are made even worse by stifling 130° heat. But Mika faces the ultimate test of courage when a six-story waterslide clashes with her dual fears of water and heights.

episodes.name: This is Not My Finest Hour
episodes.overview: Teams go to The Netherlands, One team tells the others a personal secret. Also, the stress of the race is mounting as one contestant breaks down in tears.

episodes.name: This is the Worst Thing I've Ever Done in My Life
episodes.overview: The lack of cooperation hinders one team's efforts at an explosive Detour. Also, during the series' first ever "Switchback," Teams return to one of the most infamous Roadblocks in the history of the show.

episodes.name: We’re Not Meant for the Swamp
episodes.overview: The racers end up knee-deep in Estonian bogs, and two teams are neck and neck in their race to the pit stop.

episodes.name: We're Not Working With Anybody, Ever, Anymore!
episodes.overview: Tempers flare when one team goes back on their word and a Team spirals into last place when their taxi is stolen by another Team.

episodes.name: It Starts With an “F”, That’s All I’m Saying
episodes.overview: One team decides to take a four-hour penalty when they're unable to complete a Roadblock, and another team dodges intoxicated locals while trying to complete their Detour.

episodes.name: Amazing Grace, How Sweet the Sound!
episodes.overview: A million dollars is at the final three teams' fingertips as they count out a maddening amount of poker chips and race to see "Mr. Las Vegas," who holds the final clue to the one million dollar prize.

15.name: Season 15
15.overview:
The Amazing Race 15 is the fifteenth installment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. The Amazing Race 15 featured 12 teams of two, with a pre-existing relationship, in a race around the world.

The fifteenth cycle started on Sunday, September 27, 2009, with a two hour premiere. It aired on CBS in the United States, and CTV in Canada. The Amazing Race 15 aired on Sunday nights at 8:00 p.m. ET/PT with the season finale on December 6, 2009. The show is again hosted by Phil Keoghan. In Asia, it was on-air on AXN.

episodes.name: Nanna is Kickin' Your Butt
episodes.overview: Eleven Teams depart Los Angeles for Chile, where Racers find themselves dangling 120 feet in the air, battling exhaustion and their fear of heights in order to stay alive in the game, and one Team discovers that Brazilian currency will not get them very far in Chile

episodes.name: When the Cow Kicked Me in the Head
episodes.overview: A Roadblock turns into a recipe for pain when one Racer encounters a moody cow, and things turn sour when a newly formed alliance rubs teams the wrong way.

episodes.name: Run Like Scalded Dogs!
episodes.overview: One team ends up in the hospital with food poisoning while the other teams struggle through cowboy challenges to make it through this leg of the race.

episodes.name: We Are No Longer in the Bible Belt
episodes.overview: Racers must navigate an unfamiliar and confusing train system without their teammates, take a dive over Hamburg and reunite for a nausea-inducing lesson in German gastronomy.

episodes.name: I Think We're Fighting the Germans, Right?
episodes.overview: A World War I reenactment - complete with air attacks, gunfire and explosions - tests the Racers' nerves, and one Team finds that their cocky attitude may cost them dearly when a Blind U-Turn comes into play

episodes.name: Cathy Drone?
episodes.overview: Racers are less than bubbly after sprinting to the wrong Detour location, and one Racer tests the power of duct tape after their car becomes a casualty of the Race

episodes.name: Anonymous?
episodes.overview: Teams take a stunning helicopter ride to a remote island paradise where they must race with a giant tortoise and search for a message in a bottle at the bottom of the sea

episodes.name: You're Like Jason Bourne, Right?
episodes.overview: Teams find that luck doesn't pick sides in a sweat-drenched test of endurance where they must choose to face a 153-step climb or take a 35-foot-high lesson in Chingay

episodes.name: Dumb Did Us In
episodes.overview: Tempers and tensions flare when Racers place a target on one Team's back, and feuds come to a head when a U-turn comes into play

guest_stars.character: Self - The Amazing Race Asia Host
guest_stars.name: Allan Wu

episodes.name: I Feel Like I'm in, Like, Sicily
episodes.overview: After noodling their way through their first Roadblock, Teams are forced to complete a second Roadblock, and the fate of two Teams lies in the hands of confused cabbies

episodes.name: They Don't Even Understand Their Own Language
episodes.overview: The Final 4 teams struggle with the language barrier in Shanghai while sorting through hundreds of golden Buddhas and thousands of Chinese stamps in their pursuit for a spot in the Final 3.

episodes.name: Huger Than Huge
episodes.overview: With the million-dollar prize on the line, Racers come face-to-face with Darth Vader, and Teams drop all pretense of friendliness after a cut in line cuts into another Team's time while an angry confrontation awaits another at the finish line, on the 16th season finale of THE AMAZING RACE

16.name: Season 16
16.overview:
The Amazing Race 16 is the sixteenth installment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. The Amazing Race 16 features eleven teams of two, each with a pre-existing relationship, in a race around the world.

The sixteenth cycle started on Sunday, February 14, 2010. It aired on CBS in the United States on Sunday nights at 8:00 p.m. ET/PT with the season finale on May 9, 2010, and in Canada, the show premiered on the A-Channel, not CTV, but it returned to CTV after the Winter Olympics concluded. The show was again hosted by Phil Keoghan.

episodes.name: They Don't Call It the Amazing Race for Nothin'!
episodes.overview: The 11 teams begin their worldwide journey; the team that finishes the challenge in first place earns a game-changing advantage.

episodes.name: A Kiss Saves the Day
episodes.overview: The ten remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Eastnor Castle in England to continue their race around the world for one million dollars.

episodes.name: In Phil We Trust
episodes.overview: The remaining teams continue racing in Leg 3, where a challenging detour tests one couple's relationship, while another team's Racer requires medical attention, threatening their position in the competition.

episodes.name: We Should Have Brought Gloves and Butt Pads
episodes.overview: The nine remaining teams set off from the Pit Stop at Awusa Ntso's house in Ghana on the fourth leg of a race around the world for one million dollars.

episodes.name: Tastes Like a Million Dollars
episodes.overview: The eight remaining teams depart the Pit Stop along the Norwegian border in Swedish Lapland on the fifth leg of a race around the world for one million dollars.

episodes.name: Run, Babushka, Run
episodes.overview: The race continues in St. Petersburg, Russia.

episodes.name: I Want to Be in the Circus, That's Where I Belong
episodes.overview: Teams are clowning around when they learn a traditional Russian circus act, but it's no joke when multiple teams make a critical error and misread a clue, jeopardizing their positions in the Race.

episodes.name: Ali Baba in a Suit
episodes.overview: The six remaining teams continue on the eighth leg of a race around the world for one million dollars.

episodes.name: There's a Lot of Nuts and Bullets
episodes.overview: The five remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Al Alam Palace in Oman on the ninth leg of a race around the world for one million dollars.

episodes.name: I Hate Chinese Food
episodes.overview: The remaining teams continue with the tenth leg of The Amazing Race.

episodes.name: I'm Surrounded by Ninjas
episodes.overview: The final four teams travel to South Korea where they battle it out on water and ice to make the final three in the penultimate leg of the race.

episodes.name: Hi. I'm Sorry. I'm in a Race.
episodes.overview: The final three teams soar to new heights over Southern California, competing in the final leg for a shot at the million-dollar prize and, for two teams, the chance to become the first ever all-female team to win the series.

17.name: Season 17
17.overview:
The Amazing Race 17 is the seventeenth installment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. The Amazing Race 17 features 11 teams of two, each with a pre-existing relationship, in a race around the world.

The seventeenth cycle started on Sunday, September 26, 2010. It aired on CBS in the United States in a special 90-minute episode; then returned to its normal hour-long format the following week on Sunday nights at 8:00 p.m. ET/PT with the season finale on December 12, 2010. The show was again hosted by Phil Keoghan.

episodes.name: Head Down and Hold On
episodes.overview: The 18th season begins with 11 former teams who failed to win returning for a chance to claim the $1 million prize. The race starts in Palm Springs, Cal., and continues in Sydney, Australia, where the teams swim with sharks and receive a surprise from Phil at the pit stop.

episodes.name: I Never Looked So Foolish In My Whole Entire Life
episodes.overview: The race continues in Broken Hill, New South Wales, Australia.

episodes.name: We Had a Lot of Evil Spirits Apparently
episodes.overview: The race continues in Tokyo.

episodes.name: This Is The Most Stupid Day Ever
episodes.overview: The race continues in Lijiang, located in the Yunnan Province of China.

episodes.name: Don't Ruin the Basketball Game
episodes.overview: Continuing with the clue Phil provided at the Eternal Tower in Lijiang, China, the teams head back to Kunming with the knowledge there would be a Double U-Turn ahead. A long wait for a train turned into a friendly basketball game with Flight Time and Big Easy. Pointed from the Dounan Flower Market to the Golden Horse and Jade Cock arches, the Detour awaited: teams could "Honor the Past" by arranging dolls by memory only to match a traditional Tibetan dance troupe, or "Embrace the Future" by assembling a solar water heater. Directed to the Stone Forest from the clue at the Double U-Turn, the Roadblock required safe assembly of a model of a dilophosaurus to earn the location of the Pit Stop: Green Lake Park.

episodes.name: I Feel Like a Monkey In a Circus Parade
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by a swarming sea of people on the congested streets of India, one team narrowly dodges a traffic collision while another's clumsiness threatens to spoil their chances of acing the Detour.

episodes.name: You Don't Get Paid Unless You Win
episodes.overview: The seven remaining teams depart from the Fountain of Joy in Kolkata, India for the seventh leg of the race.

episodes.name: I Cannot Deal With Your Psycho Behavior
episodes.overview: Confronted by a psychological Detour, teams try to avoid making a Freudian slip in the slick streets of Austria, and a hefty meal proves to be too big for some teams' stomachs

episodes.name: We're Good American People
episodes.overview: The Amazing Race

episodes.name: Too Many Cooks In the Kitchen
episodes.overview: The race continues in Zermatt, Switzerland

episodes.name: This Is Where It Ends (1)
episodes.overview: The final four teams race through Rio de Janeiro before heading to the finish line in Miami as the season concludes.

episodes.name: This is Where It Ends (2)
episodes.overview: The final four teams race through Rio de Janeiro before heading to the finish line in Miami as the season concludes.

18.name: Unfinished Business
18.overview:
The Amazing Race 18 is the eighteenth installment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. The Amazing Race 18 featured eleven teams of two – each returning from a previous edition for the first time since Season 11 – in a race around the world for a $1 million prize.

The eighteenth cycle started on Sunday, February 20, 2011. It aired on CBS in the United States on Sunday nights at 8:00 pm ET/PT with the two-hour season finale on May 8, 2011. The show is hosted by Phil Keoghan.

episodes.name: Kindness of Strangers
episodes.overview: The nineteenth instalment of The Amazing Race commences, with eleven teams embarking on the adventure of a lifetime.

episodes.name: The Sprint of Our Life
episodes.overview: The teams depart from the National Revolutionary Martyrs' Shrine in Taipei, Taiwan, and travel to Yogyakarta, Indonesia with the knowledge that a double-elimination awaits at the Pit Stop. A Roadblock makes racers spelunk into Goa Jomblang to find a mask and dagger to trade for the next clue, which Bill and Cathi have to await to do when confronted with their Speed Bump. The Detour gives everyone a choice to either "Shake Their Money Maker" by dancing and playing music in the streets for donations, or "Be a Ticket Taker" by parking rider's motorbikes. However, following directions when giving their earnings to an orphanage in exchange for the Pit Stop proves tricky for most, leading to a scramble to check in at Kraton Ngayogyakarta Hadiningrat.

episodes.name: Don't Lay Down On Me Now
episodes.overview: Indonesia! Elephants! And one corker of a challenge that threatens to break the spirits of quite a few teams.  The nine remaining teams depart from the Kraton Palace in Yogyakarta, Indonesia and continue on the third leg of The Amazing Race.

episodes.name: This Is Gonna Be a Fine Mess
episodes.overview: The remaining teams continue on the fourth leg of the race.

episodes.name: I Feel Like I'm In the Circus
episodes.overview: Fearing they have broken the rules, one team takes a risk that could cost them the Race. Meanwhile, an unwanted speed bump turns into a dream excursion for Liz and Marie, but will it push them even farther back.

episodes.name: We Love Your Country Already - It Is Very Spacious
episodes.overview: After falling to the back of the pack, a disheartened racer is encouraged by the spirit of the local workers, and it’s an intense foot race to the first-ever Pit Stop in Malawi.

episodes.name: Move Goat
episodes.overview: The race continues in Malawi, Africa, where teams face a double U-Turn and must decide whether to force competitors to complete both sides of a challenge.

episodes.name: Super Shady
episodes.overview: The Amazing Race

episodes.name: It's Speedo Time
episodes.overview: After a potentially game-changing error, one team hopes for a lucky break, and donning only a Speedo for their Detour task, Racers get in touch with their inner exhibitionists.

episodes.name: Release the Brake!
episodes.overview: Racers put the pedal to the metal and shift into high gear when they take a thrilling test drive, and results are far from sweet when teams also try to recreate classic Belgian waffles.

episodes.name: We Are Charlie Chaplin
episodes.overview: The final four teams make their way to Panama City, where they come face-to-face with their fears as they take in astonishing views of the city skyline.

episodes.name: Go Out and Get It Done
episodes.overview: After racing through 4 continents, 20 cities and nearly 40,000 miles, the final three teams race to Atlanta, Ga.

19.name: Season 19
19.overview:
The Amazing Race 19 is the nineteenth installment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. The Amazing Race 19 features eleven teams of two, each with a pre-existing relationship, in a race around the world. The 19th season premiered on September 25, 2011.

The nineteenth cycle started on Sunday, September 25, 2011. It aired on CBS in the United States on Sunday nights at 8:00 p.m. ET/PT with the season finale on December 11, 2011. The show is hosted by Phil Keoghan.

episodes.name: Tears of a Clown
episodes.overview: One team struggles with anxiety as everyone travels to Argentina; the contestants must skydive from a plane at 10,000 feet.

episodes.name: You Know I'm Not as Smart as You
episodes.overview: The ten remaining teams depart the Argentinian Patios de Cafayate winery on the next leg of a race around the world for one million dollars.

episodes.name: Bust Me Right in the Head with It
episodes.overview: The remaining teams continue on the third leg of the race.

episodes.name: Taste Your Salami
episodes.overview: The eight remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Escalinata de Antequera in Asuncion, Paraguay and continue on the fourth leg of the race.

episodes.name: Uglier Than a Mud Rail Fence
episodes.overview: The eight remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Piazza Castello in Turin, Italyand make their way via train and car to the German state of Bavaria, with Bopper and Mark knowing a Speed Bump awaits them.

episodes.name: This is Wicked Strange
episodes.overview: The seven remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Landhannes Farm in Bavaria and fly to Baku, Azerbaijan.

episodes.name: I Didn't Make Her Cry
episodes.overview: The six remaining teams set off from Baku, Azerbaijan on the seventh leg of the race. The disagreement that has been building up all season culminates in this episode.

episodes.name: Let Them Drink Their Haterade
episodes.overview: The Race takes an unexpected turn when an early alliance is betrayed, and an unforgiving team savors the opportunity to exact their revenge in a game twist.

episodes.name: Bollywood Travolta
episodes.overview: Gender disparities cause one Team to lose faith when a challenge seems insurmountable, and emotions run high as a Racer must weigh their own well-being against their future in the game.

episodes.name: I Need Hair to Be Pretty
episodes.overview: One determined Racer powers through pain in the wake of a physical misstep, and teams pull out all of the bells and whistles for a larger than life challenge.

episodes.name: It's a Great Place to Become Millionaires (1)
episodes.overview: The final four Teams battle for the $1 million prize in a grueling two-hour season finale that starts in Japan and concludes in Hawaii, where Teams hit the waves to put their rescue mission skills to the test.

guest_stars.character: Self - Bring that Chicken Home Host
guest_stars.name: Arnold Chun

episodes.name: It's a Great Place to Become Millionaires (2)

20.name: Season 20
20.overview:
The Amazing Race 20 is the twentieth installment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. The Amazing Race 20 features eleven teams of two, each with a pre-existing relationship, in a race around the world.

The twentieth Race premiered on Sunday, February 19, 2012. It aired on CBS in the United States on Sunday nights at 8:00 p.m. ET/PT with the two-hour season finale on May 6, 2012. The show is hosted by Phil Keoghan.

episodes.name: Double Your Money
episodes.overview: The pressure hits an all-time high as Teams discover that a new twist will allow one Team to possibly win a $2 million grand prize. Meanwhile, one team's act of kindness comes back to haunt them, on the season premiere.

episodes.name: Long Hair, Don't Care
episodes.overview: One Team makes a bold move, but it could cost them the game, while another Racer breaks down amid the frustration of a Roadblock.

episodes.name: There's No Crying in Baseball
episodes.overview: As Teams continue racing through Indonesia, they discover that it's every Team for themselves as they encounter a Double U-Turn, and Teams start to feel the heat of the Race as their heads are set ablaze.

episodes.name: Funky Monkey
episodes.overview: As Team's arrive in Bangladesh, the game gets heated as one Racer's enthusiasm pushes their competition to the breaking point. Meanwhile, one Team performs the unpleasant task of working as "rat collectors."

episodes.name: Chill Out, Freak
episodes.overview: Teams crumble amidst the intense heat of Bangladesh and emotions propel one Team through the leg after they receive disappointing news from home.

episodes.name: Get Your Sexy On
episodes.overview: Teams endure a steamy detour in Istanbul to keep their race from getting scrubbed. Meanwhile, after finishing last on the previous leg, Josh and Brent must overcome a tasty Speed Bump in order to keep their hopes of racing alive.

episodes.name: Off to See the Wizard
episodes.overview: Teams race to Moscow, Russia, where they find themselves in deep water struggling to stay in sync during a challenge. Meanwhile, one team makes a costly mistake that threatens their spot in the Race.

episodes.name: We Was Robbed
episodes.overview: As the competition heats up in Moscow, James and Abba continue on their quest to recover a lost passport. Meanwhile, an ankle injury takes its toll on one racer and threatens the team’s ability to finish a challenge.

episodes.name: Fishy Kiss
episodes.overview: As the Teams arrive in Amsterdam, they come face-to-face with a game-changing Double U-Turn and encounter one of the show's most infamous challenges in this season's "Switchback."

episodes.name: Not a Well-Rounded Athlete
episodes.overview: The final four Teams arrive in Spain and travel to Rafael Nadal's practice courts for a volleying Roadblock. Also, one Team draws blood after getting bullish with a Detour.

episodes.name: Take Down That Million
episodes.overview: With the $1 million dollar prize on the line, the final four teams race through France en route to the finish line in New York City, where they'll encounter a terrifying Houdini-inspired Roadblock.

episodes.name: Business in the Front, Party in the Back
episodes.overview: Eleven new teams begin racing on the twenty-second edition of The Amazing Race. Their first stop is the island paradise of Bora Bora, where rows of sandcastles threaten to be the downfall of multiple teams. Meanwhile, in a race first, the winner of the first leg is awarded two Express Passes, one of which must be delegated to another team.

episodes.name: Loose Lips Sink Ships
episodes.overview: The ten remaining teams continue their race through Bora Bora, where one team comes face to face with their fear of deep water. Meanwhile, another team experiences navigational problems on the water, opening the door for a possible comeback from the two penalised teams from the previous leg.

episodes.name: Like James Bond Again
episodes.overview: One team continues to struggle with a debilitating injury; in New Zealand, the racers participate in a "shemozzle" race.

episodes.name: I Love Monkeys!
episodes.overview: Stress makes one contestant cry; a team makes history while trying to stay in the game.

episodes.name: Your Tan is Totally Cool
episodes.overview: As the contestants face a double U-turn in Hanoi, Vietnam, one team receives crushing news.

episodes.name: Scorpion King Hunter
episodes.overview: Racers hunt for scorpions in Africa; one team confronts another for using a U-Turn against them.

episodes.name: Be Safe and Don't Hit a Cow
episodes.overview: An African speed trap causes problems for teams; racers are asked to water ski with crocodiles.

episodes.name: My Cheese is Out of Control
episodes.overview: The race continues in Switzerland where teams grapple with giant wheels of cheese and climb on the north face of Eiger mountain.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Fun House
episodes.overview: The final five teams plunge 37 stories through the sky and tackle a psychedelic labyrinth in Berlin, Germany.

episodes.name: Working Our Barrels Off
episodes.overview: A double U-turn in Scotland puts two of the final five teams at risk.

episodes.name: Beacon of Hope
episodes.overview: After the final four teams go bog snorkeling in Belfast, Ireland, one team's race comes to an end; the three remaining teams scour historic landmarks in Washington, D.C.; the winning team is determined. Part one of two.

episodes.name: We're Not In Oklahoma No More
episodes.overview: The 23rd season begins in Los Angeles with 11 two-member teams flying to Chile where they take to the sky for paragliding. Also: Misreading a clue lands one pair up a creek without a paddle; and the race heats up when one team steals another duo's taxi.

episodes.name: Beards in the Wind
episodes.overview: Racers take a plunge into the Arctic in Svolvaer, Norway; Marie and Tim have a tough decision to make.

episodes.name: Get Our Groove On
episodes.overview: The racers try to keep up during a polka challenge in Gdansk, Poland; teams are impacted by a double U-turn.

episodes.name: Choir Boy at Heart
episodes.overview: A team is faced with temptation; the racers sing with the Vienna Boys' Choir; an intense dispute occurs.

episodes.name: Speed Dating Is the Worst
episodes.overview: In Abu Dhabi, the teams rappel almost 200 feet and race cars at high speeds.

episodes.name: One Hot Camel
episodes.overview: Teams escape desert heat with a white-water rafting ride; two teams are faced their second double U-turn.

episodes.name: Part Like the Red Sea
episodes.overview: The final five teams make mistakes while under pressure in Bandung, Indonesia; a relationship suffers.

episodes.name: Cobra in My Teeth
episodes.overview: The final four teams eat snake in Indonesia; a challenging road block pushes racers to the boiling point.

episodes.name: Amazing "Crazy" Race (1)
episodes.overview: The final teams take part in a human bowling competition in Tokyo; one team wins $1 million.

episodes.name: Amazing "Crazy" Race (2)
episodes.overview: The final teams take part in a human bowling competition in Tokyo; one team wins $1 million.

episodes.name: Back in the Saddle
episodes.overview: Eleven all-star teams compete for a chance to win the $1 million top prize as the 24th season begins.  However, in a dramatic twist, one duo won't make it to the starting line.  The other pairs jet off to Guangzhou, China.

episodes.name: Baby Bear's Soup
episodes.overview: Mallory and Mark struggle with communication and a major mistake puts them in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: The race continues in Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia.  The teams face rapids in the Malaysian jungle on homemade rafts; a team fights to stay in the running after taxi trouble.

episodes.name: Smarter, Not Harder
episodes.overview: The race continues in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.  A racer pours blood and tears into a roadblock; a particularly difficult detour makes a racer melt down.

episodes.name: Can't Make Fish Bite
episodes.overview: Teams face struggles as they go fishing for their next clue in Sri Lanka.

episodes.name: Down and Dirty
episodes.overview: The teams are in Sri Lanka, where an exhausting Roadblock drains the racers of all their strength. Also, an epic race through the countryside ends with a footrace to the Pit Stop.

episodes.name: The Gladiators Are Here!
episodes.overview: The racers square off with Roman gladiators in a medieval detour; three teams make a deal in hope of avoiding elimination.

episodes.name: Donkeylicious
episodes.overview: Six teams encounter a double U-turn; one team considers a major decision.

episodes.name: Accidental Alliance
episodes.overview: Tension rises as the finish line gets closer; three teams form an alliance.

episodes.name: Bull Down
episodes.overview: A double U-turn in Spain threatens the alliance; one team's future is threatened by a possibly game-changing injury.

episodes.name: Hei Ho Heidi Ho
episodes.overview: The final four teams have a once-in-a-lifetime experience in Liverpool, England; a misinterpretation puts one team in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Do You Believe in Magic?
episodes.overview: The teams race through Las Vegas, where they face a final challenge designed by magician David Copperfield.

episodes.name: Go Big or Go Home
episodes.overview: The teams begin their adventures in New York's Times Square, where a game-changing element is introduced. Contestants take a gut-wrenching leap of faith.

episodes.name: When You Gotta Go, You Gotta Go
episodes.overview: The Race continues through London, England, where the Express Pass is on the line, but several teams’ hopes of a first-place finish are capsized while boating in a punt in Oxford.

episodes.name: Get Your Sheep Together
episodes.overview: The race continues in Scotland's Shetland Islands, where the teams must corral an unruly flock of sheep through an obstacle course.

episodes.name: Thinly Sliced Anchovies
episodes.overview: The race continues in Copenhagen where the dentists realize they may need to use their "Save" during a painstaking Detour. Later, one team's lack of communication leads to a massive meltdown on the mat.

episodes.name: Morocc' and Roll
episodes.overview: As a double U-turn looms in the exotic city of Marrakech, Morocco, contestants suspect each other of playing dirty.

episodes.name: I Feel Like I Just Kissed a Goat
episodes.overview: The race continues in Morocco, where a Road Block requires a member of each team to walk across a narrow bridge suspended high above the Atlas Mountains.

episodes.name: Pretty Fly for a Food Scientist
episodes.overview: As the teams race through Palermo, Sicily, unlikely alliances are formed; contestants must beat the clock during a high-octane go-cart race.

episodes.name: Hot Sexy Knights
episodes.overview: The race continues in Valletta, Malta, where teams are thrown off balance when they must serve drinks to the knights of Malta. Also, a blind Detour leaves racers on a slippery slope.

episodes.name: You're Taking My Tan Off
episodes.overview: The race continues in Singapore where a dangerous misstep leaves one competitor dangling 600 feet above the ground. Also: A traditional Asian detox leaves some teams writhing in pain.

episodes.name: Smells Like Dirty Tube Socks
episodes.overview: The contestants get muddy with an ornery ox in Manila, Philippines, during an unforgettable switchback challenge.

episodes.name: Hooping It Up
episodes.overview: The race continues in the Philippines.

episodes.name: All or Nothing
episodes.overview: The final teams race to the finish line in Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Great Way to Start a Relationship
episodes.overview: Season 26 begins with 11 dating couples, including five pairs who meet for the first time at the starting line at California's Castaic Lake. The pairs fly to Tokyo on the first leg of the race and face a U-Turn.

episodes.name: I Got the Smartest Dude
episodes.overview: The race continues in Nagano, Japan, where teams take on an Olympic-sized Detour and one pair take a tumble that threatens to jeopardize their chances in the race.

episodes.name: #MurphysLaw
episodes.overview: The race continues in Phuket, Thailand, where one team forgets their fanny pack, which puts them behind. Later, one racer celebrates the end of a leg by popping a very special question.

episodes.name: The Great Amazing Nasty Race
episodes.overview: The race continues in Bangkok.

episodes.name: Smells Like a Million Bucks
episodes.overview: The race continues in Monaco.

episodes.name: Can I Get a Hot Tub!
episodes.overview: The race continues in Amsterdam.

episodes.name: Fruits of Our Labor
episodes.overview: The race continues in Trujillo and Otuzco, Peru.

episodes.name: In It to Win It
episodes.overview: The race continues in Peru.

episodes.name: Monster Truck Heroes
episodes.overview: The final teams race to the finish line for the $1,000,000 prize.

26.name: Season 26
26.overview: The Amazing Race 26 is the upcoming twenty-sixth instalment of the reality television show The Amazing Race. In this season, the teams will consist of eleven dating couples, with five of the teams meeting for the first time in a blind date, in a race around the world for a US$1 million grand prize.

episodes.name: A Little Too Much Beefcake
episodes.overview: Eleven new teams embark on the journey of a lifetime as they race to Rio de Janeiro, where they take a helicopter ride and face a big decision.

episodes.name: Get In There And Think Like A Dog
episodes.overview: The race continues in Buenos Aires where the 10 remaining teams learn a tango with a twist and visit the church where Pope Francis was baptized.

episodes.name: Good Old Fashioned Spit in the Face
King of the Jungle
episodes.overview: Teams conquer their fears in Zambia, Africa, when they plunge more than 250 feet over the Zambezi River, feed a trio of crocodiles, and walk with lions through the jungle.

episodes.name: My Tongue Doesn't Even Twist That Way
episodes.overview: Teams travel to Paris where Racers soar high above the French countryside and "drop mics" with a popular French rapper.

episodes.name: Full Speed Ahead, Captain!
episodes.overview: One Team risks falling to the back of the pack after taking a break to sight-see, and Racers take a big jump when faced with a Double-Dutch Detour.

episodes.name: Krakow, I'm Gonna Get You
episodes.overview: Teams hit the town in Krakow, Poland with local street musicians to earn a hard day’s pay.

episodes.name: It's Always the Quiet Ones
episodes.overview: With only six teams remaining, the competition heats up when Racers face a U-Turn, and some teams enjoy the sweet taste of victory after a candy making challenge.

episodes.name: Bring the Fun, Baby!
episodes.overview: Racers face a third U-turn for the first time in the show's history, and teams try to power through an exhausting, late night detour on their way to an Indian wedding.

episodes.name: It's Not Easy Beating Green
episodes.overview: The final four teams race in Hong Kong and Macau, China, where they take part in a water show and compete for a chance to race in the final leg.

episodes.name: We Got a Chance, Baby!
episodes.overview: The final 3 teams race to Long Island, New York where, after five continents, 10 countries, and more than 34,000 miles, one will be crowned winners and awarded the $1 million prize.

episodes.name: I Should've Been a Boy Scout
Get It Trending
episodes.overview: A romance blossoms between two racers, and teams are caught in one of the largest-ever footraces to the mat for first place.

episodes.name: We're Only Doing Freaky Stuff Today
episodes.overview: The Race reaches new heights as teams climb 15,000 feet in the French Alps, and one team may be in jeopardy of elimination after dropping their clue down a mountain.

episodes.name: Let the Good Times Roll
episodes.overview: For the first time, teams travel to Yerevan, Armenia, where an express pass is on the line for the winner of the leg.

episodes.name: Welcome to Bloody Fingers 101
episodes.overview: Teams travel to the country of Georgia where they learn how to make a traditional candy and go deep into the trenches at an old Georgian winery.

episodes.name: I Have a Wedgie and a Half
episodes.overview: Teams travel to Dubai where they race camels and swim with sharks.

episodes.name: Salt That Sand!
episodes.overview: In a tight race to the mat, teams row and swim to the Pit Stop located on a boat, where the losers walk the plank and are eliminated.

episodes.name: Monkey Dance!
episodes.overview: Racers embark on a gut wrenching, 40-foot plunge and teams make a difficult decision when faced with a double U-turn.

episodes.name: The Only First That Matters
episodes.overview: As the final three teams race from Shenzhen, China to Santa Barbara, California for the final leg of the Race, they face a gut-wrenching leap of faith: jump off a building more than 150 feet high and perform a harrowing task of synchronized mountaineering.

episodes.name: We're Coming for You, Phil!
episodes.overview: Season 29 begins with 22 strangers meeting at the starting line in Los Angeles and then pairing up to form 11 teams who then fly to the first destination, Panama City.

episodes.name: Scared Spitless
episodes.overview: Teams travel to Sao Paulo, Brazil where tensions rise between two teams when one goes back on their word.

episodes.name: Bucket List Type Stuff
episodes.overview: Racers travel to Zanzibar, Tanzania where teams build and deliver desks to a local school. Also, tensions rise when teams face a blind double U-turn, and one team's Race may be in jeopardy when they misplace their passports.

episodes.name: Another One Bites the Dust
episodes.overview: A previously played U-turn causes friction between two teams in Tanzania.

episodes.name: Have Faith in Me, Broski
episodes.overview: Racers take on a record setting Roadblock by helping build a 13-story bonfire in Norway.

episodes.name: Double U-Turn Ahead
episodes.overview: The race continues in Milan and Lake Como, Italy.

episodes.name: Have Fun and Get It Done
Good Job, Donkey
episodes.overview: The race continues in Athens, Greece.

episodes.name: I Thought We Were Playing It Nice
Riding a Bike is Like Riding a Bike
episodes.overview: The race continues in Ninh Binh, Vietnam, where teams battle scorching heat while transporting shrimp baskets for one mile to a local fisherman. One racers nears their breaking point during the exhausting Roadblock.

episodes.name: We're Going to Victory Lane
episodes.overview: The final three teams race to Chicago where they must complete their last challenges within the city's most iconic landmarks, including Wrigley Field, the home of the World Series champion Chicago Cubs, before they dash to the finish line.

29.name: Season 29
29.overview: In season 29, in a brand-new twist, all 22 Racers are complete strangers who will meet on the starting line. Before “GO,”Racers will immediately compete in a challenge that will determine the order for picking a Teammate, based on nothing but first impressions. These new pairs of Teammates will then have mere moments to learn their traveling companion's name before beginning a race around the world that will span 9 countries, 17 cities and 36,000 miles.

episodes.name: You're a Champion, Prove It
episodes.overview: The milestone 30th season of THE AMAZING RACE kicks off from Washington Square Park in New York City with some of the most competitive and accomplished group of racers ever to take on the Race. Teams travel to their first destination, Iceland, where they must traverse a massive canyon high above the Geitargljufur River.

episodes.name: You're the Best French Fry Ever
episodes.overview: For the first time ever, teams square off head-to-head in a competition to earn their place on the mat and avoid elimination.

episodes.name: It's Gonna be a Fragrant Day
episodes.overview: Things get slimy at a fishy challenge, and Racers scale buildings and run through the narrow streets of Tangiers, Morocco.

episodes.name: Gotta Put Your Sole Into It (1)
episodes.overview: One team tries to stay on track after failing to read their clue, and teams face off against one another in the second head-to-head competition of the season. (St. Tropez and Provence, France)

episodes.name: Gotta Put Your Sole Into It (2)
episodes.overview: Teams face off against one another in the second head-to-head competition of the season. (Provence, France)

episodes.name: The Claws Are Out
episodes.overview: The stakes are high when teams face the dreaded double U-turn and racers struggle to navigate the streets of Prague while delivering kegs to a local party.

episodes.name: All's Fair in Love and War (1)
episodes.overview: For the first time, Racers swap teammates for an entire leg. Also, the game becomes ruthless with another double U-turn.

episodes.name: All's Fair in Love and War (2)
episodes.overview: For the first time, Racers swap teammates for an entire leg. Also, the game becomes ruthless with another double U-turn.

episodes.name: The First Rule of the Amazing Race Club (1)
episodes.overview: It's a first as the Racers travel to Bahrain. While on the road, one team's game is on the line when one of them misplaces their passport.

episodes.name: The First Rule of the Amazing Race Club (2)
episodes.overview: It's a first as the Racers travel to Bahrain. While on the road, one team's game is on the line when one of them misplaces their passport.

episodes.name: It's Just a Million Dollars, No Pressure (1)
episodes.overview: With the one million dollars on the line, the final four teams race through Hong Kong and San Francisco on the quest to cross the final finish line first. After 10 countries, 21 cities and more than 29,000 miles, host Phil Keoghan will crown one team the winners of the 30th Race around the world.

episodes.name: It's Just a Million Dollars, No Pressure (2)
episodes.overview: With the one million dollars on the line, the final four teams race through Hong Kong and San Francisco on the quest to cross the final finish line first. After 10 countries, 21 cities and more than 29,000 miles, host Phil Keoghan will crown one team the winners of the 30th Race around the world.

episodes.name: You're in Our Race Now
episodes.overview: The Amazing Race returns with the first reality showdown among some of the most memorable and competitive players from The Amazing Race, Survivor and Big Brother.

episodes.name: Knock the Newbie Out of Us
episodes.overview: Racers have a big decision to make when they face a surprise double U-turn in Laos.

episodes.name: Here Fishy, Fishy, Fishy
episodes.overview: Teams travel to Vietnam, where they must master synchronized dancing, karaoke singing and fishing for prawns.

episodes.name: I Took Out a Polar Bear
episodes.overview: Enemies are made when one team steals another team’s taxi in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam.

episodes.name: I'm a Bird, I'm a Plane, I'm on The Amazing Race!
episodes.overview: Teams take a leap of faith when choosing which detour challenge to take on, and a split-second decision may make or break one team's life in the race.

episodes.name: Who Wants a Rolex?
episodes.overview: Teams must drum up enough strength for an intense head-to-head battle before checking into the mat.

episodes.name: Living Fearlessly
episodes.overview: The Teams travel to Switzerland where they free-fall over 400 feet into the Gletscherschlucht Glacier Gorge.

episodes.name: You're the Apple in My Eye
episodes.overview: While in Switzerland, teams are surprised with the first ever public U-turn vote, where racers have to vote in front of each other.

episodes.name: Let's Split!
episodes.overview: Teams take a bumpy ride in Split, Croatia and try not to get tongue-twisted reciting poetry while in motion.

episodes.name: Chugga Chugga Choo Choo!
episodes.overview: The final five teams try not to crack while transporting eggs across town by bicycle in the Netherlands.

episodes.name: This One Is for One Million Dollars
episodes.overview: With the $1 million on the line, the final four teams race through London, where they take a helicopter ride to Dover Castle, and through Detroit, where they rappel nearly 500 feet down the Guardian Building. The team to cross the finish line first will be crowned the winners!

episodes.name: One Million Miles
episodes.overview: The Amazing Race celebrates traveling an amazing one million miles around the world when the 32nd Race kicks off from the legendary Hollywood Bowl in Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Red Lipstick Is Not My Color
episodes.overview: Teams race through Bogotá, Colombia where they encounter the "Yield," which gives them the power to stop another team's race for a designated amount of time.

episodes.name: We're Makin' Big Moves
episodes.overview: Teams are in Manaus, Brazil where they have big decisions to make when they encounter the first U-turn of the Race.

episodes.name: Olé, Olé!
episodes.overview: Teams race through Asunción, Paraguay when they compete in a series of switchback Detours from season 20, where they must either stack a pyramid of watermelons or perform a traditional Paraguayan bottle dance.

episodes.name: You Don't Strike Me as a Renaissance Man
episodes.overview: Teams are in Paris, France where they must whip up some tasty treats and make enough Crème Chantilly for four pies, as well as compete in a series of carnival games.

episodes.name: I'm Not Even Walking, I'm Falling
episodes.overview: Teams reach new heights in Berlin, Germany as they walk face-first down the exterior of a building for nearly 200 feet.

episodes.name: Give Me a Beard Bump
episodes.overview: The teams travel to Almaty, Kazakhstan, where they face the cold weather while improving a choreographed fight scene and decorating a yurt.

episodes.name: Are You a Rickshaw?
episodes.overview: In the first ever "Mega Leg" in the show's history, teams race through Hyderabad, India where they must complete double the detours and double the road blocks and travel double the distance.

episodes.name: This Is Not Payback, This Is Karma
episodes.overview: The first ever “Mega Leg” continues through Hyderabad, India where teams compete in double the detours and double the road blocks and travel double the distance.

episodes.name: Getting Down to the Nitty Gritty
episodes.overview: The final five teams race through Siem Reap, Cambodia where they face the second and final double U-turn of the season.

episodes.name: Run on Your Tippy Toes
episodes.overview: In the first-ever city sprint, the final 4 teams have no road blocks or detours, but complete team challenges as they race through Manila, the capital of the Philippines, on the penultimate leg.

episodes.name: Now It's About Winning
episodes.overview: With the $1 million prize on the line, the final three teams travel to New Orleans where, after visiting 11 countries, 17 cities and travelling more than 33,000 miles, one team will be crowned the winners of THE AMAZING RACE.

episodes.name: We're Back!
episodes.overview: "The Amazing Race" begins its historic 33rd trip around the world when 11 new teams take off from their homes and travel to their first destination, London, England.

episodes.name: It Can't Be That Easy
episodes.overview: "The Amazing Race" begins its historic 33rd trip around the world when 11 new teams take off from their homes and travel to their first destination, London, England.

episodes.name: Who Has This One in the Bag?
episodes.overview: While racing through Scotland in February 2020, teams receive shocking and unprecedented news — for the first time in the show's history, "The Amazing Race" suspends production due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

episodes.name: Ready to Restart the Race
episodes.overview: Host Phil Keoghan gathers the teams in Switzerland to restart the Race nearly 20 months after production was suspended for the pandemic, and the longest pit stop in the show's history.

episodes.name: Stairway to Hell
episodes.overview: Teams race through Switzerland, where Racers bungee jump over 700 feet off the Verzasca Dam.

episodes.name: Say Cheese
episodes.overview: Racers travel by private jet to Corsica, France, where they go canyoneering through the beautiful landscape of natural rockslides, waterfalls, and rivers.

episodes.name: Gently Down the Stream
episodes.overview: Teams continue racing through Corsica, France, where each team member must try a piece of casu martzu, also known as maggot cheese.

episodes.name: Souvlaki
episodes.overview: Teams travel to Halkidiki, Greece, where they are tested on their spelling and memory skills.

episodes.name: Rock Bottom
episodes.overview: Racers leave no stone unturned while looking for a clue in Thessaloniki, Greece.

episodes.name: In the Hands of the Amazing Race Gods
Many Firsts But Don't Be Last
episodes.overview: 12 new teams start their journey by travelling to Munich, Germany. In this season’s new twist, one team is eliminated at the end of every leg.

episodes.name: Patience, Is the New Me
episodes.overview: Teams explore the beauty of Austria and must learn a traditional wedding dance, yodel and a song performed on alpine bells.

episodes.name: It's All in the Details
episodes.overview: Teams start a Megaleg in Bologna, Italy, where they must cart an 88-pound wheel of parmigiano cheese and build a Ducati Panigale V4 motorcycle.

episodes.name: Everyone's an Artist
episodes.overview: Teams continue the megaleg and make their way to Florence, where they chisel out a sculpture from a large block of plaster and crash a fashion photo shoot.

episodes.name: The Amazing Race of Arabia
episodes.overview: Teams travel to Jordan, where they ride a train and experience a scene reminiscent of the 1963 film "Lawrence of Arabia, " search the Wadi Rum desert and visit the ancient city of Petra.

episodes.name: Step by Step
episodes.overview: A shocking elimination takes place while teams continue their Jordanian journey; teams take part in a traditional folk dance and learn the Arabic alphabet.

episodes.name: It's Simply Medieval
episodes.overview: Teams drive to Dordogne, France, the city of 1,001 castles, where they extract walnut oil, play three medieval games and flex their memory muscles while rappelling down the side of a castle.

episodes.name: La Ville Rose
episodes.overview: Teams drive to Toulouse, France, where they must run, tackle and kick their way through a roadblock while training with a champion pro rugby team.

episodes.name: Vamos a la Playa
episodes.overview: Teams embark on a mega-leg in Malaga, Spain, where racers become grill masters and brave rough waters.

episodes.name: Don't Look Down
episodes.overview: Teams continue on to Ronda, Spain, where they must choose to build an arch brick by brick or dress for success.

episodes.name: How Am I Going to Survive This?
episodes.overview: The final four teams race through Iceland to clinch a spot in the finale and a chance to win the $1 million prize.

episodes.name: The Only Leg That Matters
episodes.overview: The final three teams travel 3,000 miles to race through Nashville, Tenn., for the final showdown, where they must deliver guitars and play a giant floor piano to win the $1 million prize.

34.name: Season 34
34.overview: The Amazing Race 34 is the thirty-fourth season of the American reality television show The Amazing Race. It featured twelve teams of two competing in a race around the world. The season premiered on CBS on September 21, 2022.

episodes.name: The Amazing Race Is Back!
episodes.overview: For the first time, a former team surprises racers as judges; one team member must traverse a tightrope stretched from one rooftop to another at the historic Biltmore Hotel in downtown Los Angeles before heading to their first location, Thailand.

episodes.name: You Don't See That at Home
episodes.overview: Teams dive deeper into the countryside of Thailand for the second leg of the race, encountering catfish-infested waters and pomelo-filled rivers.

episodes.name: No Sleep and a Million Dollar Dream
episodes.overview: The teams feel the strain of commercial travel and float their way through the Mekong Delta as they are challenged between making rice paper or customizing a scooter by wrapping it in vinyl in Vietnam.

episodes.name: The Day Keeps Rockin' Here in Vietnam
episodes.overview: Teams continue racing in Vietnam and face the hustle and bustle of a congested Vietnamese market, where they must properly set up a fish stand and deliver mattresses to a local hotel.

episodes.name: Yessir, the Pink City
episodes.overview: Teams travel more than 2,000 miles from Vietnam to India where they must balance traditional pots on their heads while performing a folk dance and assemble a life-size, three-dimensional mural.

episodes.name: Driving Head-On Into Scooters
episodes.overview: For the first time, the votes for the mandatory U-turn are in and one team must complete both detours in India, bundling up flowers and transporting building materials on rickshaws in the bustling streets of Jaipur.

episodes.name: Like Two Cats Fighting in a Car
episodes.overview: Having experienced the U-turn in India, relationships are tested as teams take on their first self-drive leg in Germany. Also, teams rappel down a castle wall and use their taste buds to identify different mustards.

episodes.name: A Planes, Trains and Automobiles Day
episodes.overview: For the first time, teams visit the country of Slovenia. Racers soar to new heights in glider planes, experience roadblock surprises, and battle to remain in the race.

episodes.name: In the Belly of the Earth
episodes.overview: Teams continue racing in Slovenia, carefully traveling on foot carrying wooden pieces on their back, descending deep into a cave to assemble a giant dragon, and scraping off mussels and barnacles in the waters.

episodes.name: Everyone Loves a Comeback Story
episodes.overview: Teams travel 1,000 miles from Slovenia to Sweden where they must face their fears and skydive from 10,000 feet over the Baltic sea, recreate a midsummer tradition, and sort through recyclable items.

episodes.name: We're Finding Our Pot of Gold
episodes.overview: Teams travel to Dublin, Ireland, where they complete four challenges in the penultimate leg, including swimming in the Irish Sea, dancing with the legendary Riverdance troupe, scoring a point with the hurling team, and reciting quotes from a famed Irish novelist

episodes.name: A Sunset, Seattle Scramble
episodes.overview: The final three teams travel to Seattle, where they must complete three challenges in a scramble leg, a first in AMAZING RACE history. The challenges are inspired by Seattle’s art scene and include swinging from a high trapeze, glassblowing and being a roadie for a grunge band. The team that successfully completes these challenges and arrives first will win the $1 million prize, on the season finale.

35.name: Season 35
35.overview: Armed with a limited budget, 13 teams of two embark on a race around the world that rewards $1 million to the first team to reach the final destination.

episodes.name: You Can't Drive While You're Crying
episodes.overview: Teams begin in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico where they participate in a traditional Mexican rodeo.

episodes.name: Trust But Verify
episodes.overview: Teams continue the megaleg in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, where they must choose between detours that get them ready for a fiesta.

episodes.name: It's Not Over Til Phil Sings
episodes.overview: Teams climb the stairs to the top of El Peñon de Guatapé in Colombia to find their clue and begin the third leg of the race.

episodes.name: Those Who Wander Are Not Lost
episodes.overview: Teams paraglide their way to the start of this leg in Medellín, Colombia where they must choose between detours 'getting in sync' or 'decoding a rebus puzzle.'

episodes.name: Save the Stress for Later
episodes.overview: To begin this leg of the Race in Santiago, Chile, teams self-drive in search of Marilyn Monroe's iconic Thunderbird car to receive their next clue.

episodes.name: Our Alliance Strikes Again
episodes.overview: Teams compete in double the roadblocks and double the detours on a megaleg in Argentina.

episodes.name: Walk and Chew Gum Baby
episodes.overview: Teams must put on their best performance in Montevideo, Uruguay, when they choose between banging out a drum routine with street performers or singing a Spanish tune with professional troubadours at the detour.

episodes.name: That's What Being Strong Will Do
episodes.overview: For the first time in The Amazing Race history, teams travel to Barbados where they visit the childhood home of superstar Rihanna.

episodes.name: My Precious Cacao
episodes.overview: Racers travel to the Dominican Republic; the final five teams must complete tow road blocks.

episodes.name: The Longest Minute of Your Life
episodes.overview: In the penultimate leg, the final four teams compete for the chance to make the final three and one racer receives the surprise of a lifetime after their elimination. Then, in the final leg, the remaining three teams get schooled in American history.
